parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure (Piston Failure, Long Block Replacement)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: EPC light and low oil pressure light activation.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: PCV valve malfunction can cause engine damage, oil leaks, and decreased engine performance.
symptoms: None reported in the provided complaints.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water pump failure can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: None reported in the provided complaints.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Coolant System Leaks (Thermostat Housing and Coolant Pump Leaks)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Coolant system leaks can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage or failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Recall Repair Delays (After-Run Coolant Pump and Engine Cooling)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Delayed recall repairs can cause engine damage or failure due to prolonged exposure to faulty components.
symptoms: None reported in the provided complaints.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electric Coolant Pump Failure and Leaks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electric coolant pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage or failure, and potentially cause accidents. Leaks can also cause damage to the vehicle's electrical system and create a fire hazard.
symptoms: The vehicle's dash lights up with a warning to turn off the engine due to low coolant levels
despite the coolant gauge showing normal levels. Coolant leaks into the undercarriage of the vehicle

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the backup camera can increase the risk of accidents or injuries when reversing, as the driver may not be able to see obstacles or pedestrians behind the vehicle.
symptoms: The backup camera fails to display the rearview when the vehicle is in reverse
showing a black screen instead. The camera may also remain on when the vehicle is in drive or park mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rattling sunroof can be a distraction to the driver and potentially cause a fatal injury if the glass shatters.
symptoms: The glass sunroof makes a constant rattling noise while driving

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electromechanical steering rack can cause the steering to become stiff or difficult to maneuver, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Steering exhibits resistance when turning left or right
steering feels as if the wheels are tilting when turning.
